oai_dc:dc.dc:title: SUMMARY OF SHEEPDROVE ORGANIC FARM SILVO-POULTRY PRODUCTION SYSTEM
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Pegg, Vanessa
Pearce, Bruce
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Poultry
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Sheepdrove Organic Farm (SOF) introduced a silvo-poultry enterprise in 2002. This report describes the system as observed by Vanessa Pegg and makes recommendations for improvements to the system. Specific ad hoc reports will also be produced on specific issues as Vanessaâ€™s work progresses.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Pegg, Vanessa and Pearce, Bruce (2003) SUMMARY OF SHEEPDROVE ORGANIC FARM SILVO-POULTRY PRODUCTION SYSTEM. The Organic Research Centre, Elm Farm.
